name: Lockmancer
description:
Delve into the Dungeon and use your Skills of Stealth and Magics of Lockmancy to free the Keymancer!

In a roguelike movement system, sneak past monsters or trap them in rooms by strategically using tunnels, doors, and your ability to lock them from afar.

The game has 3 levels -  the first will get you acquainted with mechanics, the second will see you traversing a more complex and difficult floor of monsters, and the last takes you through the home stretch to freeing the Keymancer and escaping the Dungeon. 

If you get stuck on level 1, here's a small walkthrough :)

(Made for the "My First Game Jam Winter 2021" game jam)
